GSD.description:
nilfs2: fix underflow in second superblock position calculations

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.13 by commit a8ef5109f93cea9933bbac0455d8c18757b3fcb4. For more details please see the references link.
